import React, { useState } from 'react' const NewUnit = () => { const[state, setState] = useState({ name: "", size: "", price: "", image_url: "", status:"", }) function onChange(e) { setState({...state, [e.target.name]:e.target.value }) } function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() console.log(state) fetch('/storage_units', { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type":"application/json" }, body: JSON.stringify() }) } return (


); } export default NewUnit
